summary: A mod with a few new followers
descriptionHtml:
I wanted to travel around Skyrim with my friends so I added some of them to the game and I'm putting it on here in case you guys would like to run around with me or my friends as well.

You may also notice a few new NPCs around. Those are family and friends that I just thought would be cool to see in the game.Â I plan on adding more and when I do I'll update it on here.

So far there are 9 new followers and they can be found in the following places;

Keven (Hunter) - Sleeping Giant Inn, Riverwood
Liam (Light, Duel Bladed Warror) - Sleeping Giant Inn, Riverwood
Luke (Heavy, One-Handed Warrior) - Drunken Huntsman, Whiterun
Graham (Heavy, Two-Handed Warrior) - Bee and Barb, Riften
Jenny (Mage, Fire/Conjuration) - Frozen Hearth, Winterhold
Chris (Assassin, Bow) - Ratway (By the axe), Riften
Kieran (Soldier, Bow) - Castle Dour, Solitude
Andy (Assassin, Light Weapons) - Silverblood Inn, Markarth
Danny (Mage, Ice/Conjuration) - Dead Man's Drink, Falkreath
author: Wonnabehero
